reviewText: I watch it with my daughter almost nightly, we have lots of fun!  I enjoy the stories it teaches little ones!
My daughter liked the idea of helping her little sib as Angelina does. This is good to help support the sharing and helping aspect of siblings. Same quality as other Angelina's.
Another great piece.  It teaches not just dance and music, but also how to handle relationship among siblings and friends.  It's a real treat and my little one loved it!  Two thumbs up!

This is an adorable Angelina Ballerina DVD that focuses on sisters.  It is great for siblings to watch and see how they should treat each other.  I think kids learn by example and Angelina and her sister are great examples.  They work together, help one another out and make mistakes.  It is cute for any preschooler.
I have two little girls and this is a collection of sweet little stories about sisters that my girls just loved.

This sure is a Great and Very Fantastic Dvd about Sweet Angelina and her Very Sweet Sister Polly! Great Stories about these Wonderful Sisters caring for Each other and having Fun together. Angelina Learns about that Her Sister can be a Great Inspiration for a Class Assignment,Where Angelina learns that her Sister cares about Her Very Much in a Story about their Big Day,all these Stories are very heart Warming and Really Truly Amazing!!

"Superstar Sisters" is the latest of the Angelina Ballerina DVD's.  My kids both adore Angelina so they were jumping up and down (literally) when they saw I had a new DVD for them to watch.

This one is about Angelina and her sister Polly.  It's funny because my daughter Paige is 3 and calls her 4 year old brother Reed "sister" so this was another good opening for me to have a conversation with them about the difference between brother and sister!  As with my kids, the siblings have a conflict when Angelina breaks Polly's favorite music box.  A great lesson is taught about love and forgiveness. There are several other sister stories, each with their own unique lesson.

I always appreciate the moral lessons and clean humor found in Angelina stories.  The one thing that can be confusing is that there is just one title on the cover (Superstar Sisters) which make it seem it is one movie.  However, it is actually several small stories. The overall plot still involves the sister in each.  I actually enjoy a bunch of smaller stories because it's easier to break their TV viewing in shorter increments.  However, it would be helpful if the menu was shown on the DVD case.

Angelina Ballerina makes a perfect stocking stuffer for the girls AND boys on your list!  Yes my son loves it just as much as my daughter!  I love anything that keeps them BOTH entertained!
My 3 year granddaughter loves Angelina Ballerina.

I love Angelina and I'm a bit over the hill for cartoons.  This particular video I purchased for my great nieces.  I thought it was particularly poignant as these two little girls love to dance and so does Angelina and Polly!  What more can I ask for.  Adorable and well recommended.

It is a typical Angelia movie. I am basing this review on my 4y/o daughter's enjoyment of the movie. She loves this one (and all of the other AB shows). She likes this one because of the younger sibling involvement. If you kids like AB then they'll like this one too.
